MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH14 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Lanark Road and surrounding streets. We are aware of the recent faults and do apologise for the inconvenience caused during this difficult period and we are working to get supplies restored. So far we have replaced fuses and are currently using fault finding equipment to locate the fault and we now expect your supply to be restored by 3:15pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:35 PM on Monday, 15 February 2021.
